function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Centralized recirculation systems not effective at filtering out viral material","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and spread in indoor environments","Mitigation":"Install high-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, conduct system modifications, and avoid the use of centralized recirculation","Technologies":"HEPA filters, UV air cleaners, standalone air filters","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building managers"},{"Description":"Limited supply of clean air in spaces due to filter effectiveness and flow rate","Impact":"Inadequate ventilation leading to higher concentration of viral particles","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and servicing of air filters, consideration of alternative ventilation systems","Technologies":"Standalone air filters, ventilation system modifications","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Facility maintenance team"},{"Description":"Potential generation of ozone and harmful by-products from UV lamps","Impact":"Risk to occupant health from exposure to ozone and other by-products","Mitigation":"Assess the potential impact of ozone generation in advance, consider alternative air cleaning technologies","Technologies":"Alternative air cleaning technologies, advanced ozone assessment tools","People":"Building occupants, facility management","Owner":"Health and safety department"}]}
